p:
To assess assay specificity, we tested 173 sera from Laotian patients with febrile disease admitted to Savannakhet Provincial Hospital in 2013–2015 (
Table 2, S6 Fig). The SD Bioline Dengue Duo NS1/IgM tests and the Platelia NS1 ELISA showed excellent specificity of > 96%. The Panbio μ-capture ELISA detected isolated IgM in 6 (12.8%) of 47 DENV RT-PCR negative patients not classified as presumptive DF.
